citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on March
13, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the doors of the kennel building and home and
honking the horn of the government vehicle. Getting no response, the inspector called the licensee's phone and left a
message. After 30 minutes, there was no contact from anyone at the facility so a leave behind flier was left at the home
and the inspector left the property. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on March 
13, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the doors of the kennel building and home and 
honking the horn of the government vehicle. Getting no response, the inspector called the licensee's phone and left a 
message. After 30 minutes, there was no contact from anyone at the facility so a leave behind flier was left at the home 
and the inspector left the property. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious 
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
